participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Reflective and somewhat melancholic, Ethan often contemplates his past and future.
participant_1.background: i will be released in about a month. i am currently in a juvenile detention center. i feel old. my mom is coming to visit me tomorrow.

participant_2.name: Lucas
participant_2.personality: Confident and determined, Lucas is focused on his military career but carries a sense of responsibility from his family's legacy.
participant_2.background: my grandfather served in world war a. i'm in the army. i did not graduate high school. i live in canada.
